name: Wheelchair Accessible
description:
Wheelchair Accessible, a platformer in which you must not only get yourself to the end of level, but also help your disabled friend!

Controls:

A & D

Space or W to jump

walk into wheelchair and press SHIFT to grab hole, press SHIFT again to let go (Toggle)

Made for Brackeys game jam 2022.2 - my first game jam (go easy on me) .
**Slightly Unfinished**  - its a game jam, I ran out of time. It happens.

Is it good? No.    Is it finished? No.      Did I enjoy making it?     Yes, so that's fine I guess.

All Music, Art, programming is by me.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCo1rsWfE0K1mp0_PGxps-Ig
